20240720_0.title: official start homepage built
20240720_0.text: Today started the built of my personal art based homepage. Despite being the first version or also called lite-version, I'm looking forward to the results! On the occasion of the developing, I created this acryl painting in memory of these beautiful sunrises I experienced last holiday.

20240824_0.title: new artwork - Tutanchamun
20240824_0.text: Creating detailed faces was always a challenge for me, but it feels a bit easier when I can do masks. Especially the gold/red theme kept me fascinating which was the reason I finally did my first egyptian drawing.

20240725_0.title: faceless african beauty
20240725_0.text: A few weeks ago I saw this white dress in the window display and immediately wanted to draw it, but I couldn't come up with a good context. Looking for some inspiration, I found myself on pinterest and I felt overwhelmed ever since. Let me tell you, pinterest is now one of my most frequent used apps and I came up with this painting.
